creator.name: Wees- en Onbeheerde Boedelkamer van St. Maarten
creator.name_english: Orphans and Ownerless Estates Chamber of St Martin
creator.his_func: It was decided to establish an Orphans and Ownerless Estates Chamber only in 1793. The Chamber was to be administered by four commissioners: two Councillors and two of the most prominent citizens. Administrative support was supplied by the island's secretary. The Chamber was entrusted with the direction over all orphan minors for whom no guardians had been appointed and all ownerless and insolvent estates.
